items.content_html: QueryX is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a jQuery-like interface for DOM manipulation and traversal. It allows you to select elements, add/remove classes, manipulate attributes, traverse the DOM, and more, similar to jQuery but in a simpler and more lightweight manner.
items.title: SH20RAJ/QueryX: QueryX is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a jQuery-like interface for DOM manipulation and traversal. It allows you to select elements, add/remove classes, manipulate attributes, traverse the DOM, and more, similar to jQuery but in a simpler and more lightweight manner.
